info.title: Post for Me API

tags.name: Media
tags.description:
Media are media assets (images, videos, etc.) that can be attached to posts using the media url. These endpoints are only needed if your media is not already available on a publicly accessible URL.
Media assets are stored temporarily and are automatically deleted in the following scenarios:
- When the associated post is published
- After 24 hours if not attached to any post
- When the scheduled post is deleted

tags.name: Social Posts
tags.description:
Posts represent content that can be published across multiple social media platforms. Each post can have platform-specific content variations, allowing customization for different platforms and accounts. Content can be defined at three levels:

1. Default content for all platforms
2. Platform-specific content overrides
3. Account-specific content overrides

The system will use the most specific content override available when publishing to each platform and account.

tags.name: Social Accounts
tags.description:
Social accounts represent platform-specific accounts (e.g. Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook) that are used for publishing posts. 
Each social account has a unique `id` that can be referenced when creating or scheduling posts to specify which platforms the content should be published to.

tags.name: Social Post Results
tags.description:
Post results represent the outcome of publishing content to various social media platforms. They provide comprehensive information including:
- Publication status (success/failure)
- Any errors or issues encountered during posting
- Platform url to view the published post

tags.name: Social Account Feeds
tags.description:
The social account feed is every post made for the social account, including posts not made through our API. 
Use this endpoint to get the platform details for any post made under the connected account. To use this endpoint accounts must be connected with the **"feeds" permission**. 

Details will include: 
 - Post information including caption, url, media, etc.. 
 - When passing **expand=metrics**, Metrics information including views, likes, follows, etc..

Note: Currently only the following platforms are supported **Instagram**, **Facebook**, **TikTok**, **TikTok Business**, **Youtube**

tags.name: Webhooks
tags.description:
Webhooks enable you to subscribe to certain events. This involves Post for Me making a POST request to the URL of any webhooks you create.
Only the events you subscribe to will be sent to your webhook URL.

## Payload
When an event happens that your webhook is subscribed to, we will make a POST request with the following JSON body

```
    {
        "event_type": "",
        "data": {}
    }
```

The event_type will be the event that triggered the webhook POST, data will be the resulting entity from the event

## Security
To verify the POST to your webhook URL is from us we will include a secret in the header "Post-For-Me-Webhook-Secret".
When you create a webhook you will receive the secret in the response.

## Retries
If your server fails to respond with a 2XX code, requests to it will be retried with exponential backoff around 8 times over the course of just over a day.

tags.name: Social Post Previews
tags.description: Social Post Previews allow you to see what a Social Post will create for each account in the post.

upload_url.description: The signed upload URL for the client to upload the file

media_url.description: The public URL for the media, to use once file has been uploaded

id.description: Facebook User ID, Instagram Username or Instagram product id to tag

type.description: The type of tag, user to tag accounts, product to tag products (only supported for instagram)

x.description: Percentage distance from left edge of the image, Not required for videos or stories

y.description: Percentage distance from top edge of the image, Not required for videos or stories

thumbnail_url.description: Public URL of the thumbnail for the media

thumbnail_timestamp_ms.description: Timestamp in milliseconds of frame to use as thumbnail for the media

tags.description: List of tags to attach to the media

collaborators.description: Instagram usernames to be tagged as a collaborator

share_to_feed.description: If false video posts will only be shown in the Reels tab

location.description: Page id with a location that you want to tag the image or video with

trial_reel_type.description: Instagram trial reel type, when passed will be created as a trial reel. If manual the trial reel can be manually graduated in the native app. If perfomance the trial reel will be automatically graduated if the trial reel performs well.

privacy_status.description: Sets the privacy status for TikTok (private, public)

is_ai_generated.description: Flag content as AI generated on TikTok

is_draft.description: Will create a draft upload to TikTok, posting will need to be completed from within the app

auto_add_music.description: Will automatically add music to photo posts

duration_minutes.description: Duration of the poll in minutes

options.description: The choices of the poll, requiring 2-4 options

reply_settings.description: Who can reply to the tweet

community_id.description: Id of the community to post to

quote_tweet_id.description: Id of the tweet you want to quote

reply_settings.description: Who can reply to the tweet

privacy_status.description: Sets the privacy status of the video, will default to public

made_for_kids.description: If true will notify YouTube the video is intended for kids, defaults to false

location.description: Page id with a location that you want to tag the image or video with

collaborators.description: List of page ids to invite as collaborators for a Video Reel

privacy_status.description: Sets the privacy status for TikTok (private, public), or YouTube (private, public, unlisted)

made_for_kids.description: If true will notify YouTube the video is intended for kids, defaults to false

is_draft.description: Will create a draft upload to TikTok, posting will need to be completed from within the app

is_ai_generated.description: Flag content as AI generated on TikTok

auto_add_music.description: Will automatically add music to photo posts on TikTok

community_id.description: Id of the twitter community to post to

quote_tweet_id.description: Id of the tweet you want to quote

reply_settings.description: Who can reply to the tweet

collaborators.description: List of page ids or users to invite as collaborators for a Video Reel (Instagram and Facebook)

share_to_feed.description: If false Instagram video posts will only be shown in the Reels tab

trial_reel_type.description: Instagram trial reel type, when passed will be created as a trial reel. If manual the trial reel can be manually graduated in the native app. If perfomance the trial reel will be automatically graduated if the trial reel performs well.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the post was last updated

connection_type.description: The type of connection; If using our provided credentials always use "organization". If using your own crednetials then only use "organization" if you are using the Community API

permission_overrides.description: Override the default permissions/scopes requested during OAuth. Default personal scopes: openid, w_member_social, profile, email. Default organization scopes: r_basicprofile, w_member_social, r_organization_social, w_organization_social, rw_organization_admin

connection_type.description: The type of connection; instagram for using login with instagram, facebook for using login with facebook.

permission_overrides.description: Override the default permissions/scopes requested during OAuth. Default instagram scopes: instagram_business_basic, instagram_business_content_publish. Default facebook scopes: instagram_basic, instagram_content_publish, pages_show_list, public_profile, business_management
Override the default permissions/scopes requested during OAuth. Default scopes: public_profile, pages_show_list, pages_read_engagement, pages_manage_posts, business_management
Override the default permissions/scopes requested during OAuth. Default scopes: user.info.basic, video.list, video.upload, video.publish

Override the default permissions/scopes requested during OAuth. Default scopes: user.info.basic, user.info.username, user.info.stats, user.info.profile, user.account.type, user.insights, video.list, video.insights, comment.list, comment.list.manage, video.publish, video.upload, biz.spark.auth, discovery.search.words

Override the default permissions/scopes requested during OAuth. Default scopes: https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtube.force-ssl, https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtube.upload, https://www.googleapis.com/auth/youtube.readonly, https://www.googleapis.com/auth/userinfo.profile
Override the default permissions/scopes requested during OAuth. Default scopes: boards:read, boards:write, pins:read, pins:write, user_accounts:read
Override the default permissions/scopes requested during OAuth. Default scopes: threads_basic, threads_content_publish
